title: 208 Chat Restrictions.
body:
I guess I started actively trying to reform just a bit late (Just finished my 60-game chat restriction).

Post your record here. GOML.
This absurd number of chat-restricted games has completely gotten rid of my motivation to reform. Now I will say what I want, when I can. If I EVER get rid of this, it will probably end up giving me 600+ which in this case I'll just quit and throw all my money at Valve.
